thread.title: Travel + Leisure: When in the Triangle for a day, eat here
thread.title_full: Travel + Leisure: When in the Triangle for a day, eat here

author: Rebecca Troyer
title: Travel + Leisure: When in the Triangle for a day, eat here
text:
John West Chefs Kim Floresca and Daniel Ryan recently chatted with Travel + Leisure magazine aboutâ€¦ more Travel + Leisure recently asked chefs Kim Floresca and Daniel Ryan of Chapel Hill's One Restaurant for the best places to eat in Raleigh, Durham and Chapel Hill . In the travel magazine's article "Chef's Tour: North Carolina's Research Triangle in Five Meals," Floresca and Ryan suggest the following: Breakfast: Loaf (Durham), Carrboro Coffee Roasters, Lucette Grace (Raleigh) Lunch: Toro (Durham) Dinner: Mateo (Durham), An Cuisines (Cary) Dessert: The Parlour (Durham), Rose's Meat Market and Sweet Shop (Durham) Nightcap: Peccadillo (Carrboro), The Crunkleton (Chapel Hill)
